name: CARTEL (itch)
description:
Cartel is a Random Tower Defense Game. Hire towers using briefcases and defeat enemies to earn cash. Place down Producers($$$) to earn more cash.



Credits to:
- HeatlyBros for the Soundtrack "Dark Conspiracy"
- IBuildGod for SFX


PS. I recommend you guys read whats on "GUIDE" button first. :D
